column1: Unable to locate NGR taken from sheet Whole area is on a slope facing NW to the sea
Station no 1997/5 before change of river division lines after 1938
1954 Considerable adjustment of daily entries particularly Aug and Sept Total for year unchanged
1955 Nov 4 Inspection Gauge sound but loose Site on hill facing NW possibly o/e but trees nearby Recommended new gauge
Post 1960 known as Redcliffe Bay SRC_ID 9407
